This test documents Blink's web-exposed policy-controlled features.
All changes to this list should go through Blink's feature review process: http://www.chromium.org/blink#new-features

accelerometer
ambient-light-sensor
autoplay
camera
document-domain
document-write
encrypted-media
font-display-late-swap
fullscreen
geolocation
gyroscope
layout-animations
lazyload
legacy-image-formats
magnetometer
microphone
midi
oversized-images
payment
picture-in-picture
speaker
sync-script
sync-xhr
unoptimized-images
unsized-media
usb
vertical-scroll
vr
wake-lock
